featured.text: I’ve just 32 that I’ll die very soon and I’m going to be reborn as a pig.

definition.zh_def: 重生；再生，通常指在精神或情感上獲得新的生命或狀態。
definition.en_def: To be born again or to experience a revival or renewal.
definition.example: After a long break, she felt reborn and ready to take on new challenges.
